summary: REQ-1 appears implemented by wrapping lobby chatroom card thumbnail media in a rounded, overflow-hidden container (e.g., `rounded-lg overflow-hidden`) so `object-contain` media and hover effects are clipped to rounded corners. No backend changes are shown.

hallucinated_features.description: Project tracking/metadata updates in `project_state.json` (adding new_feature_requests AR-1/AR-2 and marking status pending) were made even though the BuildRequest only asked for a UI thumbnail clipping fix.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest does not request changes to project metadata/state files; only UI behavior in the lobby card thumbnail component.
